message: I walk around for a bit, following the map of Platinum Jail on my Coil.
Everywhere I look, an ad keeps catching my eye.
"Special Celebration"
It's plastered all over massive digital posters and billboards, so I couldn't avoid it if I wanted to.
That has to be the event Granny mentioned. It's probably a good idea to go.
Unfortunately, that's about all the information I get from my walk.
I'm starting to get fed up with all the signs praising Platinum Jail and Toue.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I'm exhausted."

name: 蓮
message: "You've been walking a long time."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. Maybe we should check out where we're staying. Directions, please."

name: 蓮
message: "Very well."
I decide to stop by a fast food place on the way.

Even little things can get to me when I'm hungry, so filling my empty stomach is a priority.

Of course, this is Platinum Jail's fast food. Even the storefront is fancier than anything you'd find in the Old Residential District, so I'm a little hesitant to go in.
But I manage. Then, following Ren's directions, I finally arrive at my destination.
The place is in what looks like a residential district, rows upon rows of extravagant villas.
Ours is a smaller building toward the end.
Compared to the other buildings, it looks a bit older.
There's a plate with the word "GLITTER" set above the door.
The neighboring building has a different word above its door, so I assume it's the building's name.
I hold my Coil up to the screen next to the door. After the telltale click of the lock, I turn the old-fashioned doorknob and enter.
